meanings.definition: Belonging to or affecting a particular person
meanings.sent1: My personal belongings are kept in a special box.
meanings.sent2: She values her personal space and privacy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally wore my personal socks to work today!
meanings.sent4: The personal touch of handmade gifts is always appreciated.
meanings.sent5: The personal connection we share makes our friendship strong.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a person's private life
meanings.sent1: He prefers to keep his personal matters private.
meanings.sent2: The diary contains her personal thoughts and feelings.
meanings.sent3: It's important to respect others' personal boundaries.
meanings.sent4: The movie delves into the personal struggles of the main character.
meanings.sent5: The personal memories we create together are precious.

meanings.definition: Done, made, or performed by a particular person
meanings.sent1: The painting is a personal masterpiece of the artist.
meanings.sent2: Her personal artwork reflects her unique style.
meanings.sent3: I tried my personal best in the competition.
meanings.sent4: The personal touch of the chef is evident in every dish.
meanings.sent5: The personal effort she puts into her work is admirable.

meanings.definition: Intended for use by one person at a time
meanings.sent1: Each student has their own personal desk in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The library provides personal study carrels for quiet reading.
meanings.sent3: I always bring my personal headphones to listen to music.
meanings.sent4: The personal computer at home is faster than the shared one at work.
meanings.sent5: The personal locker assigned to me is where I keep my belongings.
